code: import React from"react";import"./ListContainer.css";import ListItem from"../ListItem/ListItem";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ListContainer=_ref=>{let{listItems,listNumber,isListItemChecked,setIsListItemChecked,setListItems,setListItems2,setListItemsIn3,showThirdList,showArrows}=_ref;const handleCheckboxChange=()=>{setIsListItemChecked(!isListItemChecked);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list_header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",name:"list",checked:isListItemChecked,onChange:handleCheckboxChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"list ".concat(listNumber,"  (").concat(listItems.length,")")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list_items",children:listItems.map(eachItem=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{list_id:eachItem.id,current_container:eachItem.current_container,list_number:eachItem.list_number,name:eachItem.name,description:eachItem.description,setListItems:setListItems,setListItems2:setListItems2,setListItemsIn3:setListItemsIn3,showThirdList:showThirdList,showArrows:showArrows},eachItem.id))})]});};export default ListContainer;
